paper_abstract: Use of large-eddy simulation (LES) data in electromagnetic wave propagation modeling is not very common because of the high computational cost involved. A new phase-screen method is proposed to model radio wave propagation, in the atmospheric turbulence, using the resolved scale refractivity obtained from LES. The proposed method offers the same level of accuracy, as the one already existing in the literature, at much cheaper cost. (C) 2009 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A new phase-screen method for electromagnetic wave propagation in turbulent flows using large-eddy simulation
